ing: 3/4 fluid ounce Cointreau or other orange liqueur
3/4 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
des: "Use a French accent when pronouncing the 'range.'  I made this drink by accident - I was in the middle of mixing up a Cosmopolitan when I discovered I was out of cranberry juice.  Very refreshing!"
ins: Pour the vodka, Cointreau, orange juice, and sweet and sour mix into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass over crushed ice to serve.
